TopicTitle: Fuel Duct Question, Regarding with Refueling Stations.

Articles.Content:
I'm unsure about making a refueling station for the reason that i'm unsure how the fuel ducts work, When a rocket or plane docks will the fuel duct automatically start refueling the plane? From the 2 Jumbo Fuel Tanks Into The Docking Part of My Station, Then into the plane? Or do i need something else?

If you don't understand the question (Which is fine ) Then here's basically what im asking.

Do fuel ducts automatically start transferring fuel into a rocket/plane when docking is established.

Edited January 15, 2014 by ThatKerbal
Once you're docked, you need to transfer the fuel manually. Alt-rightclick on the source tank and the intended destination, and start the transfers. Don't touch anything or it'll stop.

Once you're docked, you need to transfer the fuel manually. Alt-rightclick on the source tank and the intended destination, and start the transfers. Don't touch anything or it'll stop.

Yeas, without mods there's no to automatically transfer fuel.
Oh okay thanks for telling me
also, you don't need the fuel ducts to move the fuel around, you can transfer fuel between any tanks on the connected vessels
